title: Gallic War 6.17 - Gods of the Gauls 3

content.question: According to lines 4-5 (De his . . . opinionem), how do the Gauls' beliefs about the gods compare with those of other peoples?

frqParts.text: According to lines 4-5 (De his . . . opinionem), how do the Gauls' beliefs about the gods compare with those of other peoples?
